# Beberapa Function yang Berguna

```{r}
bikin_matrix = function(n){
  # membuat matrix random n x n
  v = sample(0:9,n^2,replace = T)
  A = matrix(v,byrow = T,ncol = n)
  return(A)
}


bikin_matrix(4)
```
